item.title: AMD reiterates FSR Redstone is only for Radeon RX 9000 cards, feature availability will vary by title - VideoCardz.com
item.description:
1. AMD reiterates FSR Redstone is only for Radeon RX 9000 cards, feature availability will vary by title  VideoCardz.com
  2. AMD announces FSR Redstone premiere on December 10 — confirms technology will be limited to the RX 9000 series  Tom's Hardware
  3. AMD Rebrands "FidelityFX Super Resolution" to Its "FSR" Acronym  TechPowerUp
  4. AMD's FSR Redstone for supercharged gaming debuts on December 10 – but it's RX 9000 only, leaving older Radeon GPUs in the cold  TechRadar
  5. CoD: Black Ops 7: RX 9060 XT, RX 9070 XT and Ray Regeneration  HWCooling.net
